div.head: 大小便閉澀
div.div: major and minor relief blocked and with roughness; defecation and urination are blocked or rough

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief blocked and with roughness; defecation and urination are blocked or rough

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with da xiao bian bu li 大小便不利 , defecation and urination do not pass freely. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ku zao 苦棗 quoting Shi xing ben cao 食性本草 : 大小便秘澀 writes: 大小 便閉澀 , “ Defecation and urination are blocked or rough ”.
